He treads on the reversal of the ocean and heaven and earth.
There are a hundred thousand buddhas in front of him.
They're all my sons and grandsons.
(Chu Anfang).
Zhaozhou asked a woman.
"Where are you going?
He said, "To steal Zhaozhou's bamboo shoots.
The teacher said.
"What did Zhaozhou do when he suddenly met him?
The old woman then gave him a slap.
The teacher left.
The verse said.
"It's hard to shoot with a straight bow.
The principle of trapping a tiger is the longest.
"Even though he may have craved a grain of rice from another person.
Who would have known that half a year's worth of food would be lost?'
(Haein Shin).
Zhaozhou's bamboo shoots were stolen by his wife.
How could he be willing to stop after being slapped in the face?
'You must strike when you're ready to strike.
Where you can, you'll draw your head out.
(Yeoheon Zun).
Zhaozhou took this from the old man.
The thief got a slap in the face for investigating the drain.
After the thief failed to commit the crime, he returned.
How many patched-robe monks in the world know this?
(Dizang En).
When Zhaozhou was squeezing his wife, Kāśyapa Nanda frowned.
Kāśyapa Nārāyaṇa frowned widely.
But his wife waved a palm at him.
He's always had many problems and fallen short.
(Zhang Wujie).
'Never has weakness prevailed over strength.'
Catching a thief is clearly seen as a reward.
He waved his palm at that moment.
He's like a dumb child eating ginger.
(Fogan Eng).
[Continued] Rarely does he arrive at the tiger's den or the demon's palace.
The old woman loses her footing, and people doubt it.
Zhaozhou ate his palm, but no one would understand.
Until now, it's been right and wrong.
(Jinling Yu Dobaoist).
"What's gone is like a hill that's heavy.
He's coming like a feather lighter.
There's no separate path between going and coming.
He tilts his lid and wears a new one.
(Yuan of the Blind Hall).
A heroic army violates the river at the border.
No one passes through the smog and dust that obstruct the road.
Our country's stability depends on the presence of Zhang Liang.
He sings Chu's song at the top of the city on the painted horns.
(Xuedou Zong).
"At a glance, I go up to the wine bar with a whip.
Why don't we just sit on the ground and watch Yangzhou?
He has cut off both right and wrong, long and short.
A rat stealing is still difficult to resemble a dog stealing.
(Wutuan Fan).
They see each other but don't touch each other's displeasure.
They stop their cheeks and slap each other's palms, but don't let each other escape.
"He considers this pattern to be tasteless.
Could it be that Zhaozhou's body and life are inviting him to come back?
(Gyeok-kiun).
[Zengzhao] Zhaozhou told the crowd.
"Even when you read the sūtras, you're still in birth-and-death.
Even if you don't read the sūtras, you'll still be in birth-and-death.
How will you all get out of this?
The saṃgha then asked.
"What happens when you don't stay?
The master said.
"It's really attained.
If it's not real, then they'll surely escape birth and death.
The verse said.
"Even when I read the sūtras, I'm inside birth-and-death.
He sits in a monastery without a bottom in his rice bowl.
Even when I don't read the sūtras, I'm still in birth-and-death.
There's nothing to put on inside a pile of brocaded clothing.
Suddenly, a crow magpie raises its cry.
He turned around and jumped up and down, rejoicing in the whole family.
Don't propose it.
Now, it's thrown out in front of everyone.
A thousand hands of great compassion can't lift them up!

translation: Chanzong chanson gu lianzhu tongji, vol. 19
